title: Taggable Trait Parameters
description: Controls how tags can be attached to composed objects.

maxTags.description: Maximum number of tags that can be stored.

allowCustomTags.description: Whether users may add new tags outside the allow list.

allowedTags.description: Optional allow list of approved tags.

caseSensitive.description: Whether tag comparisons should be case sensitive.

tagMinLength.description: Minimum character length for a tag value.

tagMaxLength.description: Maximum character length for a tag value.

allowTagModeration.description: When true, custom tags enter pending state and require moderator approval.

synonymResolution.description: Synonym handling mode: none, suggest (suggest canonical form), or auto (auto-replace).
